pasta.domain

Class PASTATime

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.domain.PASTATime

  • public class PASTATime
extends java.lang.Object
    I could have called it something better, but this sounded amusing Minimum frequency is 1 second (anything below could be abused to put too much load on the machine by mistake)
    Since:
    2013-01-21
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu
